entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 04:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
